hello hi

%

main [] [ text "hello hi" ]

%

{! my comment hi }

%

main [] [ comment "my comment hi" ]

%

both text {! and comment }

%

main []
  [ text "both text", comment "and comment" ]

%

{!a comment}some text {! another comment

  but this
    time
  it
   is multi
   line!
}

%

main [] [ comment "a comment", text "some text", comment "another comment

  but this
    time
  it
   is multi
   line!" ]

%

hello {name} world

%

main [] [ text "hello", var "name", text "world" ]

%

<div><p>Hello {name}</p></div>

%

main [] [
  div [][
    p [][
      text "Hello",
      var "name"
    ]
  ]
]

%

<div></div>

%

main [] [ div [][] ]

%

<custom></custom>

%

main [] [ custom [][] ]

%

<div>
  <ul>
    <li>Apple</li>
    <li>{Banana}</li>
    <li>Kiwi</li>
  </ul>
</div>

%

main []
  [ div [] [
    ul [] [
      li [] [ text "Apple"]
    , li [] [ var "Banana"]
    , li [] [ text "Kiwi"]]
    ]
  ]

%

<div>
  <p>
    <area><area><area></area><area>
  </p>
</div>

%

main [] [ div[][ p[][ area[][], area[][], area[][], area[][] ] ] ]

%

<input />
<input>
<input>
<input>bazbar</input>

%

main [][ input[][], input[][], input[][], input[][], text "bazbar" ]

%

<hr />
<hr>
<hr />
<hr />
<img src="quu">
<img src="quux">
<p>test</p>

%

main []
  [ hr[][], hr[][], hr[][], hr[][], img [ src text "quu" ][], img [ src text "quux" ][], p[][ text "test"] ]

%

<img id="baz" src={filesource}>

%

main []
  [ img [ id text "baz", src var "filesource" ] [] ]

%

<input>
<span>{name}</span>

%

main [] [
    input [][]
  , span [][ var "name" ]
]

%

<img src="test.png" alt={description} id="should {betext}" />

%

main [] [
  img [
      src text "test.png"
    , alt var "description"
    , id text "should {betext}"
  ][]
]

%

<p>{?isAdmin}Welcome back!{/isAdmin}</p>

%

main [] [
  p [] [
    when "isAdmin" [
      text "Welcome back!"
    ]
  ]
]

%

{^isAdmin}
  {#users}
    <li>{name}</li>
  {/users}
{/isAdmin}

%

main [] [
  unless "isAdmin" [
    range "users" [
      li [] [ var "name" ]
    ]
  ]
]

%

{#uncloseditems}
  <li>{stillbuildstree}</li>

%

main [] [
  range "uncloseditems"[
    li [] [var "stillbuildstree" ]
  ]
]

%

{#fruits}
  {#x}
    <u class={style}>
      {^name}
        <li>No name</li>
      {/name}
      {?name}
        <li>{name}</li>
      {/name}
    </u>
  {/x}
{/fruits}

%

main [] [
  range "fruits"[
    range "x" [
      u[class var "style"][
        unless "name" [
          li [] [text "No name"]
        ],
        when "name" [
          li [] [var "name"]
        ]
      ]
    ]
  ]
]

%

{! uninitialized element }
</x>

%

main[][ comment "uninitialized element"]

%

{! element e mismatch }
<x><d><y></y></e></x>

%

main[][ comment "element e mismatch", x[][ d[][ y[][]]]]

%

{! uninitialized control }
{/x}

%

main[][ comment "uninitialized control"]

%

{! control e mismatch }
{?x}{?d}{#y}{name}{/y}{/e}{/x}

%

main[][ comment "control e mismatch", when "x"[ when "d"[ range "y"[ var "name" ]]]]
